mapper.select: select f.*, (select url from airline a where a.airline_id = f.airline_id) url, (select name from airline a where a.airline_id = f.airline_id) name from flight f where departure = #{departure} and dep_date=#{depDate} and (code, collected_date) in ( select code, max(collected_date) as collected_date from flight group by code ) order by collected_date desc

select collected_date ,fee, round(avg(fee)) as averageFee, min(fee) as lowestFee, max(fee) as highestFee from flight where code = #{code} and airline_id = #{airlineId} and dep_date = #{depDate} group by collected_date ,fee order by collected_date ASC
